Title: De-escalation Success
Summary: The associate diffused the tension by listening without defensiveness.
Reflective Prompt: What traits help an agent succeed in calming an emotional escalation?

Title: Unexpected Empathy
Summary: The customer came in angry but thanked the associate by the end for understanding their frustration.
Reflective Prompt: How does empathy convert anger into gratitude?

Title: Escalation Ignored
Summary: The system marked the issue as resolved despite repeated complaints. The customer posted publicly.
Reflective Prompt: What happens when escalation logic fails and the system doesn't adapt?

Title: Tone Mismatch Spiral
Summary: The assistant misread sarcasm as enthusiasm and continued promoting a service the user disliked.
Reflective Prompt: How can symbolic memory help reduce tone mismatch errors in customer interactions?
